abstract: Novocell, a stem-cell researcher, has drummed up a further $25 million in venture funding from insider investors. The latest round was led by Johnson & Johnson Development. Other insiders included Sanderling Ventures, Asset Management and Pacific Horizon Ventures.
lead_paragraph: Novocell, a stem-cell researcher, has drummed up a further $25 million in venture funding from insider investors. The latest round was led by Johnson & Johnson Development. Other insiders included Sanderling Ventures, Asset Management and Pacific Horizon Ventures.

headline.main: Novocell Generates $25 Million in Latest Round
